title: **Looking For A Season 5 Ranked Team!**

replies.body:
cho mid? yeah cos thats not a thing right...

lol cho was played mid EXCLUSIVELY for like 8 months not long ago. like FOTM mid for 8 months.

Well it worked, somehow, even tho all his %%%% is ap, so yea.

I h8 cho gath mid now, it doesnt look right xD

i didnt miss anything......

i listed the pictures of some of the more common ones i use lately.

if it CAN jungle, i can do it. except %%%%ing AD TF, card picking is too hard!

(ive been jungling heimer on my smurf, 18-2 win rate so far with 6+ KDA every game.)
I'm gold 4.. i think im quite a good jungle i added you in game. Main Jungler is Jarvan 4 although i can play elise and panth well aswell

Hey  I'm interested in a ranked team
I am a jungle/Support main 
Ranked: Pat 4~ still playing so it may go up and down
Champ Pool: Jungle - Sej, Vi, J4,and i can learn anyone else with alittle bit of time
Support - Nami, Thresh, Leo and almost all the others :)
